file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-12-09-04 - MAIN-DOOR CONTROL MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR CONTROL MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the main-door control-microswitch assembly. B. The microswitch assembly is installed in center fuselage I, below the floor. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- MAIN-DOOR CONTROL MICROSWITCH - 52-12-09-000-801-A STAIRS DOOR REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- MAIN-DOOR CONTROL MICROSWITCH - 52-12-09-400-801-A STAIRS DOOR INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-12-09 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-12-09-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 2. MAIN-DOOR CONTROL MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the main-door control-microswitch assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 25-24-01-000-801-A/400 PASSENGER-CABIN FLOOR LINING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 131 231CF Below the floor 131 231DF Below the floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage I, below the floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, open the MAIN DOOR 1 and MAIN DOOR 2 circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-12-09 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove the floor lining and floor panel 231CF and 231DF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100). Refer to AMM TASK 25-24-01-000-801-A/400, and AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-801- A/400 or AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400, as applicable. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (7). (2) Remove the screws (4) and washers (5). (3) Remove the support (6) with the microswitch assembly (1). (4) Remove the bolts (3) and the nuts (2) which attach the microswitch assembly (1) to the support (6). (5) Remove the microswitch assembly (1) from the support (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-12-09 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR Microswitch Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 131 DET. A C B 1. MICROSWITCH ASSEMBLY 7. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. NUT (2) 3. BOLT (2) 4. SCREW (3) DET. C 5. WASHER (3) 6. SUPPORT DET. B 145AMM520120.MCE D EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-12-09 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-12-09-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 3. MAIN-DOOR CONTROL MICROSWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the main-door control-microswitch assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - PASSENGER-CABIN FLOOR LINING - INSTALLA- AMM TASK 25-24-01-400-801-A/400 TION MAIN-DOOR CONTROL MICROSWITCH - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-12-09-820-802-A/500 MENT AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 131 231CF Below the floor 131 231DF Below the floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage I, below the floor I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the microswitch assembly (1) on the support (6). (2) Tighten the bolts (3) and nuts (2) which attach the microswitch assembly (1) to the support (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-12-09 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Put the support (6) on the fuselage structure. (4) Put the washers (5) and screws (4) in their installation position. (5) Tighten the screws (4) which attach the support (6) to the structure. (6) Connect the electrical connector (7). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the MAIN DOOR 1 and MAIN DOOR 2 circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them. (2) Do the main door microswitch adjustment ( AMM TASK 52-12-09-820-802-A/500). (3) Install the floor panel 231CF and 231DF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100) and floor lining. Refer to AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 as applicable, and AMM TASK 25-24-01-400-801-A/400. (4) Close the main door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-12-09 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
